website_summaries.verdict: Multiple handy features make this Libman mop worth considering despite a few quirks.
pros: Built-in sprayer makes mopping a breeze
Mop is lightweight and easy to maneuver
cons: Tank is awkward to fill and is prone to developing leaks

customer_reviews.title: I have dogs and I mop the floor often because of dirty paw tracks
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without this mop. I have dogs and I mop the floor often because of dirty paw tracks. Love that I can use my own cleaning fluids snd change them up as needed for hardwood or tile.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Golden

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mop. I was very skeptical if this would ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop. I was very skeptical if this would work with the squeeze spray handle, but it worked great. I love that you make your own cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very effective, lightweight as well!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cleaning business and a client requested we use her Libman Spray Mop on her hardwoods. I liked it so much I bought the same one to use at another clients business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and well made. I actually bought one for my mother as well. It is lightweight and works great, especially when you have pets and messy husbands.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This is not durable. Why I've had to buy 3 in the last 3 years is beyond me. They always end up leaking???
customer_reviews.author: wingsafading

customer_reviews.title: Easy,money saving easy to put ur own cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs an this is great for every day clean up.A money saver no pads to buy.pads can be thrown in washer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Elensky

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Easy to use. Makes cleaning my floors much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that pad is washable and I can refill with my own cleaning fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mersdorf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: The perfect mop. Recommended by my housekeeper. I ordered extra pads so I could mop the whole house at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S. Spacke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier and more convenient than swiffer types
customer_reviews.text: Wider head than swiffers , washable pad stays on well, use the solution of your choice. This is my second one. Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will use it often!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! We use it daily in our home!! What I love most is that we can use the cleaner of our choice.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Was paranoid opening the very broken packaging
customer_reviews.text: After further investigation i revisited the broken box with the broken part. There were two mops where I thought there was one. I was able to put together one of the mops with parts that fit. So sorry for the confusion...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Donnellan

customer_reviews.title: Very overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I found this product in my grocery store for almost half the cost of this one. In addition, the hook from which you can hang it broke as soon as I tried to hang it up. Otherwise, it's great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I received a broken one it never works . Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Since I got this thing I couldn’t use it when I presse the top there is no water coming out I’m so disappointed I got a broken one 😡
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Handle seems to get stuck then sprayer doesn't spray well after couple months.. Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast shipping from the seller. Had a little problem but the seller corrected it quickly . I would recommend this product and the seller. .
customer_reviews.author: Russell L Griffing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and love that I can use any liquid floor cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one as a gift. I have had mine for a few years. I really like that I can put the cleaner of my choice into it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boltin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I received the mop but no squeeze bottle! I waited a long time to get it now this....disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: great for wood floors
customer_reviews.text: love using this on my wood floors! a great tool
customer_reviews.author: Loye L. Redding

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: First time I filled the resivoure and mopped, the liquid leaked out everywhere. Very upset that I received a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a washable microfiber mop that also had a water dispenser. This mop works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Tripe

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken
customer_reviews.text: The product came broken. Never had a chance to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Mop!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mop to replace our Clorox Ready-Mop, and the quality of this one is very much better. I like that it uses reusable pads instead of disposable ones. The spray function works really well. We use a solution of Mr. Clean with the refillable bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Stone

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use one in my motor home and one in my home. I tell everyone about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: easy to fill easy to use with a pad you can throw in the wash. Extremely convenient for quick cleanups and washing all floor.s love the fact i can use my own cleaners. .
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Winston

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this one and plan to reinforce the loop so I can continue storing it like this. Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two of these. I store them hanging by the handle loop. The first loop broke making the whole thing shatter and fall off the wall. I ordered this one and plan to reinforce the loop so I can continue storing it like this. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A WASTE OF YOUR HARD-EARNED MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and it worked wonderfully. The second time I needed it, the spray handle was no longer working. WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY! =/
customer_reviews.author: 8harlee

customer_reviews.title: nice mop way better than swifter
customer_reviews.text: I love the mop but it arrived broken ;-( bought a new one locally
customer_reviews.author: Chicago2305

customer_reviews.title: This mop is by far the best mop I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This mop is by far the best mop I've ever owned. We have a dog and two kids who track messes in to our house constantly and I have to mop sometimes multiple times a day. This mop makes it quick and easy and I love that it's refillable with water or my own cleaner and I do not have to buy specific refills for this.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Chandler

customer_reviews.title: I love it because you can use any product you want ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. What I wasn't doing is emptying the container each time I used it and it, over 2-3 years, developed a leak. I did NOT follow the directions. I love it because you can use any product you want in it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Milloy

customer_reviews.title: I had to replace one of these that lost it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace one of these that lost it's spray nozzle and wanted something similar as I had purchased extra mop pads. I use it a lot but gave it medium review for tendency to lose spray head and I found similar for less money with lots of extras. I still use a mop and bucket but being able to grab and clean in a jiffy can't be beat. Muddy dog tracks, leaking plant water, drips from refrig to stove or at the sink.....
customer_reviews.author: ETet

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mop
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 cats and 1 dog, many of whom have potty problems, so I use my mop A LOT! I finally had to replace my old Libman spray mop after the spray feature broke due to years of use. I love how well the mop head swivels around furniture and how light weight it is--so very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: zoojulie

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I love that it is light weight and easy to move around. I like that you can use any cleaning liquid you want to put it it. I like that you don't have to keep buying pads to mop with that you can throw the pads in the washing machine. I also ordered an extra pad to have on hand when I need it. I am totally satisfied. One more thing I have dogs and they sometime they have accidents and I can just grab my Libman mop and keep my floors clean with little efffort.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl mosley

customer_reviews.title: Durable:  Can use disposable pads & your choice of liquid
customer_reviews.text: I like that the spray does NOT spray yards ahead like the cheapie OTHER one. I had my last one for several years and would have STILL had it if the builders wouldn’t have smashed one side by putting the granite countertop on it. Surprisingly, I use the disposable pads on it and that works fine. I like that I can pick what I fill the tank up with. I have used pure alcohol, the purple cleaner, hydrogen peroxide, and a little water and Chlorox. All worked great. Got one for my friend too! She is now a convert too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality..
customer_reviews.text: This mop is good quality. Unlike other brands we had that worked the same way, this one is strong and we'll design in a way that will not break. Other brand we had broke where the bottle is inserted because of the poor quality material and dumd design, this mop surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Deennisse Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Makes mopping so easy
customer_reviews.text: I had one once before, it got lost in a move, so I ordered this and am as pleased with it as before. The last one recommended mixing water and vinegar, so that's what I do, along with a few drops of essential oil. The spray and pad are wide enough to cover a small area if I spill something, and to also cover enough floor space for general cleaning. USA made too and the price is great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop!
customer_reviews.text: I am in mop heaven! I have tried the shark steamer, a squeegee sponge head mop, etc. We hired cleaners for a few months after our baby was born and they used this mop. I LOVE IT!!! So quick, easy and effective. Some reviewers say it leaks. I have never had an issue with this. Buy this mop!!!
customer_reviews.author: melimm

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would love this, and I mostly do, but the velcro pads are just too rough. It will scrub, but not fully clean. Kind of like when you use the scrub side of a sponge on a greasy dish. You need both sides for clean dishes! Is there a softer, microfiber pad out there? If there is, then it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J Bike Rider

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this mop!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad you have it online, since I can't find it in stores in Maine. This is what Swiffer should be ... a spray mop that uses any cleaner I love and has washable heads I don't need to replace constantly. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Hill Byron

customer_reviews.title: Love is short-lived!
customer_reviews.text: You will love this mop until it stops working. Third time the sprayer quit!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Environmental friendly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this great mop! It is light weight and so easy to use that our 7 yo grandson loves to mop our floors for us! We also enjoy the $ saving ability to wash the mop cover over & over! Saves the environment too! We even bought our Grandson his own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. I keep Bona in the unit for my wood floors and use Lysol in a spray bottle for my tiled floor.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  unik mop head
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Makeind the cleaning process very easy and comfortable. The green pad is excellent and better then all the other mops I used.
customer_reviews.author: Niv S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my mop and have been using this brand for a long time. I would recommend to any one likes easy mopping.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley R. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great mops!!
customer_reviews.text: I had had these for years. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: gloria n.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! And American made
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! And American made. I LOVE that I can add whatever cleaning mix I like for each service. Allows me to avoid dangerous chemicals and only use what's safe for my kids and pets
customer_reviews.author: christal Y.

customer_reviews.title: Mop buy
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase. So easy to use. I like that I can use my own cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: Teddybearplus2

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.text: What I like about it is with Swiffer you have to keep buying thier product. With Libman you put your own product in. I really love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny L. Surmeier

customer_reviews.title: but love that I can just put water in the cartridge
customer_reviews.text: Have had many hardwood floor mops over the years, but love that I can just put water in the cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M. Shatteen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ONE OF THE BEST DESIGN IN THE MARKET. EASY TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Yo

customer_reviews.title: Another one bites the dust!
customer_reviews.text: This mop breaks all the time. I have had two in the last year and they both quit spraying. What a shame they have such a great product and make it so cheaply (not price wise because the price sure isn't cheap!).
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: It would have gotten 5 stars if I didn't have to push it...
customer_reviews.text: Works way better then the Swiffer. the nubby (reusable) cleaning pad cleans tough spots easier and I love that I can refill it with my favorite cleaners. One bottle for my laminate and one for my tile.
customer_reviews.author: K Holt

product_meta.title: Libman Freedom Wide Spray Mop, Greeen
product_meta.description: Maintain interior hard floor surfaces easily with the Libman Freedom Spray Mop. It has a long 50" steel handle with a trigger spray top and a hanger feature for convenient storage. This clean spray mop has a 16.5" head and a 360-degree swivel that lets you cover a large area and reach into corners easily. It also has a removable and reusable microfiber pad that allows you to remove dirt and grime without damaging your floors. Plus, it features a removable tank, giving you the option of filling it on or off the mop.
feature_bullets: Powerful precompression spray mechanism helps dispense your preferred cleaning solution from its easily refillable tank
Mop neck swivels 360 degrees for extra control and reaching tough spots
The thick, absorbent microfiber pad cleans deep, is easy to remove, and is machine washable
15.38"x5.13" microfiber pad with a total mop height of 55.25"
Quality made in the USA since 1896

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars191 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
